metadata.name: Potential Product Class Reconnaissance Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of WMIC in order to get a list of firewall and antivirus products

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('antivirusproduct')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('firewallproduct'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of WMIC in order to get a list of firewall and antivirus products
